actions.text: Text of Measure Incorporated into H.R.2150.

official_title: To authorize a foreign-built launch barge to transport an offshore drilling platform jacket in the coastwise trade of the United States.

summary.text: Authorizes a named foreign vessel to transport an offshore drilling platform jacket from Arkansas Pass, Texas, to Viosca Knoll 989 on the Outer Continental Shelf.

titles.title: To authorize a foreign-built launch barge to transport an offshore drilling platform jacket in the coastwise trade of the United States.
